trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Timers.Timer" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="E:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed" /> 之 <see cref="T:System.Timers.Timer" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Timers.ElapsedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Timers.ElapsedEventHandler>委派，就可以識別即將處理方法<xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example sets up an event handler for the <xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=nameWithType> event, creates a timer, and starts the timer.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會設定事件處理常式<xref:System.Timers.Timer.Elapsed?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件，會建立一個計時器，並啟動計時器。

trans-unit.source: The event handler has the same signature as the <xref:System.Timers.ElapsedEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 此事件處理常式具有相同的簽章<xref:System.Timers.ElapsedEventHandler>委派。

trans-unit.source: The event handler displays the <xref:System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs.SignalTime%2A> property each time it is raised.
trans-unit.target: 事件處理常式會顯示<xref:System.Timers.ElapsedEventArgs.SignalTime%2A>屬性會引發此事件每次。
